## jx get aws

Displays AWS account information

### Synopsis

Display the AWS information for the current user

```
jx get aws info [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # Get the AWS account information
  jx get aws info
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help            help for aws
  -o, --output string   The output format such as 'yaml'
```
